summary: An ordinance relating to and providing rules and regulations for the operation of steam engines and boilers in the City of Seattle, licensing the operators thereof, creating a Board of Examining Engineers, and providing penalties for the violation thereof, and repealing Ordinance No. 18423, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the licensing of engineers of steam engines and steam boilers, fixing the amount of license fee, providing penalty for violation of this ordinance and repealing Ordinance No. 16084" and all ordinances amendatory thereof or in conflict herewith.
